resources.string: Register a Keyword and a set of Actions from below list. Whenever a message with registered Keyword is received from any of the parents mobile number, all the actions registered with that keyword will be executed
Lock - Screen will be Locked when a message \'Lock\' is received
Kidmode - Selected settings in Sms Actions will be done when a message \'Kidmode\' is received

string.i: Click here to read Sms Policy

string.name: smsactionsheader
string.i: Note: Sms messages will be considered only from Registered Mobile Numbers. Click here to Add/Update

resources.string:
1. Sms messages will be read only when Receive and Read Sms Permission is given by the user

 2. Sms message will be read only when it is received from any of the registered mobile numbers

 3. Screen Lock will happen only when Lock Action is enabled in "Sms Actions"
 Enabling it requires ReadSms and Device Admin Permission to Lock the Screen

 4. Screen Lock will happen when an Sms 'Lock'(case-insensitive) is received from any of the registered mobile numbers

 5. Screen Lock will happen 10 seconds after receiving the Sms

 6. Kid Safe Mode Settings will be executed only when it is enabled in "Sms Actions"
 Enabling it requires ReadSms Permission

 7. Kid Safe Mode settings will be executed only when an Sms 'kidmode'(case-insensitive) is received from any of the registered mobile numbers

 8. Kid Safe Mode settings will be executed 10 seconds after receiving the Sms

 9. Additional 'Modify System Settins' permission is required to enable 'Turn Off Screen' and 'Brightness' options
